## Vector4.abs() method

Calculates the absolute values of a Vector4.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static abs(a: Vector4, result?: Vector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The input vector. |
|  result | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector (can be the same vector as a or b). if not specified, a new vector will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md)

The output vector
